verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah; set to Alamoth. A Song. God <WH430> is our refuge <WH4268> and strength <WH5797>, A very <WH3966> present <WH4672> help <WH5833> in trouble <WH6869>.
Therefore will we not fear <WH3372>, though the earth <WH776> do change <WH4171>, And though the mountains <WH2022> be shaken <WH4131> into the heart <WH3820> of the seas <WH3220>;
Though the waters <WH4325> thereof roar <WH1993> and be troubled <WH2560>, Though the mountains <WH2022> tremble <WH7493> with the swelling <WH1346> thereof <WH5542>. [[Selah
There is a river <WH5104>, the streams <WH6388> whereof make glad <WH8055> the city <WH5892> of God <WH430>, The holy <WH6918> place of the tabernacles <WH4908> of the Most High <WH5945>.
God <WH430> is in the midst <WH7130> of her <WH4131>; She shall not be moved: God <WH430> will help <WH5826> her <WH6437>, and that right early <WH1242>.
The nations <WH1471> raged <WH1993>, the kingdoms <WH4467> were moved <WH4131>: He uttered <WH5414> his voice <WH6963>, the earth <WH776> melted <WH4127>.
Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> is with us <WH430>; The God of Jacob <WH3290> is our refuge <WH4869>. <WH5542>[[Selah
Come <WH3212>, behold <WH2372> the works <WH4659> of Jehovah <WH3068>, What desolations <WH8047> he hath made <WH7760> in the earth <WH776>.

He maketh wars <WH4421> to cease <WH7673> unto the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>; He breaketh <WH7665> the bow <WH7198>, and cutteth <WH7112> the spear <WH2595> in sunder <WH7112>; He burneth <WH8313> the chariots <WH5699> in the fire <WH784>.
Be still <WH7503>, and know <WH3045> that I am God <WH430>: I will be exalted <WH7311> among the nations <WH1471>, I will be exalted <WH7311> in the earth <WH776>.
Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> is with us <WH430>; The God of Jacob <WH3290> is our refuge <WH4869>. <WH5542>[[Selah
